rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: Policy Resource
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: A PolicyReference or a Policy

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: Policy Reference Resource
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: A collection of, or a single, PolicyReference

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: policy references
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: A collection of Policy References

rdf:Property.rdfs:label: expiry
rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: States how long the policy reference file (or policy) remains valid.

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: expiry
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: States how long the policy reference file (or policies) remains valid.

rdf:Property.rdfs:label: absolute date
rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: An absolute date in http format.

rdf:Property.rdfs:label: maximum age
rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: The maximum time before expiry.

rdf:Property.rdfs:label: start time
rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: The time in http date format that the policy was validated.

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: policy reference
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: A Policy Reference

rdf:Property.rdfs:label: about
rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: The policy being referenced.

rdf:Property.rdfs:label: base
rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: The policy base URI for includes and excludes.

rdf:Property.rdfs:label: include
rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: Defines areas of the site to be covered by this policy.

rdf:Property.rdfs:label: exclude
rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: Defines areas of the site not covered by this policy.

rdf:Property.rdfs:label: hint
rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: A hint where other relevant policy references can be found.

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: hint
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: A hint where other relevant policy references can be found.

rdf:Property.rdfs:label: scope
rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: The domain names to which the hint applies.

rdf:Property.rdfs:label: path
rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: The location of the hinted policy reference files relative to the applicable host.

rdf:Property.rdfs:label: include
rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: Cookies covered by the policy.

rdf:Property.rdfs:label: exclude
rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: Cookies not covered by the policy

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: cookie description
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: A description of a set of cookies

rdf:Property.rdfs:label: domain
rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: Matches the domain name part of the cookie.

rdf:Property.rdfs:label: path
rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: Matches the path part of the cookie.

rdf:Property.rdfs:label: value
rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: Matches the value part of the cookie.

rdf:Property.rdfs:label: name
rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: Matches the name part of the cookie.

rdf:Property.rdfs:label: method
rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: The name of a method to which the policy applies

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: policy
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: A P3P Policy

rdf:Property.rdfs:label: disclosure
rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: A natural language privacy statement

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: privacy statement
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: A natural language privacy statement

rdf:Property.rdfs:label: opt instructions
rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: A link to instructions that users can follow to request or decline to have their data used for a particular purpose.

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: opt instructions
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: Instructions that users can follow to request or decline to have their data used for a particular purpose.

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: test
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: Used for testing purposes. If a policy is of type p3p:Test then the policy is just an example and as such it MUST be ignored.

rdf:Property.rdfs:label: entity
rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: Identifies the legal entity making the representation of the privacy practices contained in the policy.

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: legal entity
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: a legal entity

rdf:Property.rdfs:label: access
rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: Indicates whether the site provides access to various kinds of information.

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: access class
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: A class of information types defined by P3P.

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: access
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: The superclass of all classes of information defined by p3p.

p3p:AccessClass.rdfs:label: all
p3p:AccessClass.rdfs:comment: Access is given to all identifiable information.

p3p:AccessClass.rdfs:label: contact and other
p3p:AccessClass.rdfs:comment: Access is given to identified online and physical contact information as well as to certain other identified data.

p3p:AccessClass.rdfs:label: ident contact
p3p:AccessClass.rdfs:comment: Access is given to identified online and physical contact information.

p3p:AccessClass.rdfs:label: other ident
p3p:AccessClass.rdfs:comment: Access is given to certain other identified data.

p3p:AccessClass.rdfs:label: none
p3p:AccessClass.rdfs:comment: No access to identified data is given.

rdf:Property.rdfs:label: dispute resolution
rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: A collection of dispute resolution procedures that may be followed for disputes about a service's privacy practices.

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: resolution procedure
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: A dispute resolution procedure.

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: customer service
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: Individual may complain to the Web site's customer service respresentative for resolution of disputes regarding the use of collected data.

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: independent organization
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: Individual may complain to an independent organization for resolution of disputes regarding the use of collected data.

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: court
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: Individual may file a legal complaint against the web site.

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: applicable law
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: Disputes arising in connection with the privacy statement will be resolved in accordance with the referenced law.

rdf:Property.rdfs:label: service
rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: The resolution services

rdf:Property.rdfs:label: verification
rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: A resource which can be used for verification purposes.

rdf:Property.rdfs:label: remedy
rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: The possible remedies in case a policy breach occurs.

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: remedy
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: A remedy in case a policy breach occurs.

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: remedy class
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: A class of remedies.

p3p:RemedyClass.rdfs:label: correct
p3p:RemedyClass.rdfs:comment: Errors or wrongful actions arising in connection with the privacy policy will be remedied by the service.

p3p:RemedyClass.rdfs:label: money
p3p:RemedyClass.rdfs:comment: If the service provider violates its privacy policy it wil pay the individual an amount specified in the human readable privacy policy or the amount of damages.

p3p:RemedyClass.rdfs:label: law
p3p:RemedyClass.rdfs:comment: Remedies for breaches of the policy statement will be determined based on the law referenced in the human readable description.

rdf:Property.rdfs:label: statement
rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: Data practices that are applied to particular types of data

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: statement
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: A data practice applied to particular types of data

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: non identifiable
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: There is no data or no identifiable data collected.

rdf:Property.rdfs:label: consequence
rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: Consequences that can be shown to a human user to explain why the suggested practice may be valuable in a particular instance even if the user would not normally allow the practice.

rdf:Property.rdfs:label: purpose
rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: Defines the purpose for which the data practise is employed

rdf:Property.rdfs:label: purpose(always)
rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: The purpose is always required; users cannot opt-in or opt-out of this use of their data.

rdf:Property.rdfs:label: purpose(opt in)
rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: Data may be used for this purpose only when the user affirmatively requests this use.

rdf:Property.rdfs:label: purpose(opt out)
rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: Data may be used for this purpose unless the user requests that it not be used in this way.

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: purpose
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: The purpose for which the data practise is employed

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: purpose class
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: The class of purpose classes

p3p:PurposeClass.rdfs:label: current activity
p3p:PurposeClass.rdfs:comment: Information may be used by the service provider to complete the activity for which it was provided, whether a one-time activity such as returning the results from a Web search, forwarding an email message, or placing an order; or a recurring activity such as providing a subscription service, or allowing access to an online address book or electronic wallet.

p3p:PurposeClass.rdfs:label: administration
p3p:PurposeClass.rdfs:comment: Information may be used for the technical support of the Web site and its computer system. This would include processing computer account information, information used in the course of securing and maintaining the site, and verification of Web site activity by the site or its agents.

p3p:PurposeClass.rdfs:label: research and development
p3p:PurposeClass.rdfs:comment: Information may be used to enhance, evaluate, or otherwise review the site, service, product, or market. This does not include personal information used to tailor or modify the content to the specific individual nor information used to evaluate, target, profile or contact the individual.

p3p:PurposeClass.rdfs:label: tailoring
p3p:PurposeClass.rdfs:comment: Information may be used to tailor or modify content or design of the site where the information is used only for a single visit to the site and not used for any kind of future customization.

p3p:PurposeClass.rdfs:label: individual
p3p:PurposeClass.rdfs:comment: Information may be used to create or build a record of an identified particular individual or computer.

p3p:PurposeClass.rdfs:label: pseudo
p3p:PurposeClass.rdfs:comment: Information may be used to create or build a record of a particular individual or computer that is tied to a pseudonymous identifier, without tying identified data (such as name, address, phone number, or email address) to the record.

p3p:PurposeClass.rdfs:label: pseudo analysis
p3p:PurposeClass.rdfs:comment: Information may be used to create or build a record of a particular individual or computer that is tied to a pseudonymous identifier, without tying identified data (such as name, address, phone number, or email address) to the record. This profile will be used to determine the habits, interests, or other characteristics of individuals for purpose of research, analysis and reporting, but it will not be used to attempt to identify specific individuals.

p3p:PurposeClass.rdfs:label: pseudo decision
p3p:PurposeClass.rdfs:comment: Information may be used to create or build a record of a particular individual or computer that is tied to a pseudonymous identifier, without tying identified data (such as name, address, phone number, or email address) to the record. This profile will be used to determine the habits, interests, or other characteristics of individuals to make a decision that directly affects that individual, but it will not be used to attempt to identify specific individuals.

p3p:PurposeClass.rdfs:label: individual analysis
p3p:PurposeClass.rdfs:comment: Information may be used to determine the habits, interests, or other characteristics of individuals and combine it with identified data for the purpose of research, analysis and reporting.

p3p:PurposeClass.rdfs:label: individual decision
p3p:PurposeClass.rdfs:comment: Information may be used to determine the habits, interests, or other characteristics of individuals and combine it with identified data to make a decision that directly affects that individual

p3p:PurposeClass.rdfs:label: contact somehow
p3p:PurposeClass.rdfs:comment: Information may be used to contact the individual

p3p:PurposeClass.rdfs:label: contact
p3p:PurposeClass.rdfs:comment: Information may be used to contact the individual, through a communications channel other than voice telephone, for the promotion of a product or service. This includes notifying visitors about updates to the Web site.

p3p:PurposeClass.rdfs:label: historical preservation
p3p:PurposeClass.rdfs:comment: Information may be archived or stored for the purpose of preserving social history as governed by an existing law or policy.

p3p:PurposeClass.rdfs:label: telemarketing
p3p:PurposeClass.rdfs:comment: Information may be used to contact the individual via a voice telephone call for promotion of a product or service.

p3p:PurposeClass.rdfs:label: other
p3p:PurposeClass.rdfs:comment: Information may be used in other ways.

rdf:Property.rdfs:label: recipient
rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: A legal entity, or domain, beyond the service provider and its agents where data may be distributed

rdf:Property.rdfs:label: recipient always
rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: The recipient always receives this data

rdf:Property.rdfs:label: recipient(opt in)
rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: The recipient may receive this data only when the user affirmatively requests it

rdf:Property.rdfs:label: recipient(opt out)
rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: The recipient will receive data unless the user requests that it not be used in this way

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: recipient
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: A legal entity, or domain, beyond the service provider and its agents where data may be distributed

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: recipient class
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: A class of legal entities, or domains, beyond the service provider and its agents where data may be distributed

p3p:RecipientClass.rdfs:label: ours
p3p:RecipientClass.rdfs:comment: Ourselves and/or our entities acting as our agents or entities for whom we are acting as an agent

p3p:RecipientClass.rdfs:label: delivery
p3p:RecipientClass.rdfs:comment: Delivery services possibly following different practices

p3p:RecipientClass.rdfs:label: unrelated
p3p:RecipientClass.rdfs:comment: Legal entities whose data usage practices are not known by the original service provider

p3p:RecipientClass.rdfs:label: public
p3p:RecipientClass.rdfs:comment: Public fora such as bulletin boards, public directories, or commercial CD-ROM directories

rdf:Property.rdfs:label: recipient description
rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: a description of the recipient

rdf:Property.rdfs:label: retention policy
rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: The kind of retention policy that applies to the data referenced by the subject

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: retention policy
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: A retention policy

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: retention policy class
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: A Class of retention policies

p3p:RetentionPolicyClass.rdfs:label: no retention
p3p:RetentionPolicyClass.rdfs:comment: Information is not retained for more than a brief period of time necessary to make use of it during the course of a single online interaction

p3p:RetentionPolicyClass.rdfs:label: stated purpose
p3p:RetentionPolicyClass.rdfs:comment: Information is retained to meet the stated purpose

p3p:RetentionPolicyClass.rdfs:label: legal requirement
p3p:RetentionPolicyClass.rdfs:comment: As required by law or liability under applicable law: Information is retained to meet a stated purpose, but the retention period is longer because of a legal requirement or liability

p3p:RetentionPolicyClass.rdfs:label: business practices
p3p:RetentionPolicyClass.rdfs:comment: Information is retained under a service provider's stated business practices

p3p:RetentionPolicyClass.rdfs:label: indefinitely
p3p:RetentionPolicyClass.rdfs:comment: Information is retained for an indeterminate period of time

rdf:Property.rdfs:label: data
rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: the data to be transferred or inferred

rdf:Property.rdfs:label: optional data
rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: the data to be optionaly transferred or inferred

rdf:Property.rdfs:label: category
rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: hints to users and user agents as to the intended uses of the data

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: category
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: category

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: category class
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: A classification of data, a subclass of Category.

p3p:CategoryClass.rdfs:label: physical
p3p:CategoryClass.rdfs:comment: Information that allows an individual to be contacted or located in the physical world - such as telephone number or address.

p3p:CategoryClass.rdfs:label: online
p3p:CategoryClass.rdfs:comment: Information that allows an individual to be contacted or located on the Internet - such as email

p3p:CategoryClass.rdfs:label: unique id
p3p:CategoryClass.rdfs:comment: Non-financial identifiers, excluding government-issued identifiers, issued for purposes of consistently identifying or recognizing the individual

p3p:CategoryClass.rdfs:label: purchase
p3p:CategoryClass.rdfs:comment: Information actively generated by the purchase of a product or service, including information about the method of payment

p3p:CategoryClass.rdfs:label: financial
p3p:CategoryClass.rdfs:comment: Information about an individual's finances including account status and activity information such as account balance, payment or overdraft history, and information about an individual's purchase or use of financial instruments including credit or debit card information

p3p:CategoryClass.rdfs:label: computer
p3p:CategoryClass.rdfs:comment: Information about the computer system that the individual is using to access the network - such as the IP number, domain name, browser type or operating system.

p3p:CategoryClass.rdfs:label: navigation
p3p:CategoryClass.rdfs:comment: Data passively generated by browsing the Web site - such as which pages are visited, and how long users stay on each page

p3p:CategoryClass.rdfs:label: interactive
p3p:CategoryClass.rdfs:comment: Data actively generated from or reflecting explicit interactions with a service provider through its site - such as queries to a search engine, or logs of account activity

p3p:CategoryClass.rdfs:label: demographic
p3p:CategoryClass.rdfs:comment: Data about an individual's characteristics - such as gender, age, and income

p3p:CategoryClass.rdfs:label: content
p3p:CategoryClass.rdfs:comment: The words and expressions contained in the body of a communication - such as the text of email, bulletin board postings, or chat room communications

p3p:CategoryClass.rdfs:label: state
p3p:CategoryClass.rdfs:comment: Mechanisms for maintaining a stateful session with a user or automatically recognizing users who have visited a particular site or accessed particular content previously - such as HTTP cookies

p3p:CategoryClass.rdfs:label: political
p3p:CategoryClass.rdfs:comment: Membership in or affiliation with groups such as religious organizations, trade unions, professional associations, political parties, etc

p3p:CategoryClass.rdfs:label: health
p3p:CategoryClass.rdfs:comment: information about an individual's physical or mental health, sexual orientation, use or inquiry into health care services or products, and purchase of health care services or products

p3p:CategoryClass.rdfs:label: preference
p3p:CategoryClass.rdfs:comment: Data about an individual's likes and dislikes - such as favorite color or musical tastes

p3p:CategoryClass.rdfs:label: location
p3p:CategoryClass.rdfs:comment: Information that can be used to identify an individual's current physical location and track them as their location changes - such as GPS position data

p3p:CategoryClass.rdfs:label: government
p3p:CategoryClass.rdfs:comment: Identifiers issued by a government for purposes of consistently identifying the individual

p3p:CategoryClass.rdfs:label: other
p3p:CategoryClass.rdfs:comment: Other types of data not captured by the above definitions

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: optional
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: A P3P processor is not required to understand the value of the rdf:valueof property of resources of this type.

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: mandatory
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: A P3P processor is required to understand the value of the rdf:valueof property of resources of this type.

rdf:Property.rdfs:label: optional
rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: A p3p processor is not required to understand the value of the only property of the value of this property.

rdf:Property.rdfs:label: mandatory
rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: A p3p processor is required to understand the value of the only property of the value of this property.

rdf:Property.rdfs:label: Relative To
rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: Defines what context the class is relative to

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: Relative Class
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: A Class whose extension is context dependent

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: data element
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: A specific item of data a service might collect

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: unstructured data element
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: A data element with no component parts

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: structured data element
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: A data element with component parts

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: structured data element class
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: A class of data elements with component parts

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: unstructured data element class
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: A class of data elements with no component parts

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: Data Element Component
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: Data Element Component

p3p:DataElementComponent.rdfs:label: data element property
p3p:DataElementComponent.rdfs:comment: A part of a data structure

rdf:Property.rdfs:label: extends
rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: Extends another dataElementComponent

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: image
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: An image or logo

rdf:Property.rdfs:label: width
rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: Width in pixels of the image

rdf:Property.rdfs:label: height
rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: Height in pixels of the image

rdf:Property.rdfs:label: alternative text
rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: A very short text alternative to the image

rdf:Property.rdfs:label: short description
rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: A short human readable description of the subject

rdf:Property.rdfs:label: long description
rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: A human readable description of the subject

rdf:Property.rdfs:label: image
rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: An image or logo associated with the subject

p3p:DataElementComponent.rdfs:label: referrer
p3p:DataElementComponent.rdfs:comment: last uri requested by the user

p3p:StructuredDataElementClass.rdfs:label: referrer
p3p:StructuredDataElementClass.rdfs:comment: last uri requested by the user
